title: Homemade Blueberry Lemonade
directions: Place the blueberries, lemon juice and 1 cup of water in a blender and blend until smooth. Strain the blueberries mixture through a fine-mesh strainer. Use a spoon to press the last of the liquid through.
Add the rest of the water and honey and mix until honey dissolve. Fill the glasses with ice and pour the lemonade over. Serve immediately.
